title: Sound On: Biden Sells Infrastructure, Vaccine Mandate
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden Sells Infrastructure, Vaccine Mandate
description:
Guests: Sheila Burke, Harvard Kennedy School Adjunct Lecturer, former Chief of Staff to Senator Bob Dole, and chair of the Government Relations and Public Policy Group Practice at Baker Donelson, White House Deputy Press Secretary Chris Meagher and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
